snippet.title: The Next 'Diablo' Style RPG Needs As Many Heroes As 'DOTA 2' Or 'League Of Legends'
snippet.description: Why haven't any Diablo-style RPGs come out with character lists as long as League of Legends? read »

snippet.title: 'Dota 2' Review: A Multiplayer Masterpiece
snippet.description: Video Valve’s Dota 2, the “sequel” to the original Warcraft III mod map, has officially launched. It’s been in beta for several years, and it’s now undergoing release just in time for Dota 2’s massive eSports event, The International. The original DotA was one of many map mods that was created [...] read »

snippet.title: Dota 2: How To Play With New Players
snippet.description: Are you ready to dive into Dota 2? Are you trying to talk your friends into a game? There are so many Dota 2 guide choices out there for new players that the world doesn’t need another (Try this one). Instead, this guide will look at the new player from [...] read »

snippet.title: eSports Rising: Dota 2 and The International 2012
snippet.description: Video The stage is set at The International in Seattle’s Benaroya Hall. It’s the final day of the tournament and last year’s winner Na’Vi is getting ready to take on iG in the final series. This is the Dota 2 Super Bowl, and it’s every bit as exciting. There’s electricity in [...] read »

snippet.title: Heroes Of Newerth Pro Gamer Kyle 'Swindlemelonzz' Freedman Believes ESports Will Be On TV By 2018
snippet.description: VideoIn the eSports field, most of the attention is focused on big games like Riot Games’ League of Legends, Blizzard Entertainment’s StarCraft II and Activision’s Call of Duty: Black Ops II. But S2 Games has steadily grown its user base of Heroes of Newerth (HoN) since switching to the popular [...] read »

snippet.title: Valve's 'Dota 2' Free-to-Play, Includes In-Game Store And Steam Workshop
snippet.description: Valve has announced that its upcoming title Dota 2 will be free-to-play, but not pay-to-win. It will also be open to the modding community. read »

snippet.title: 'Heroes Of Order & Chaos' Brings MOBA To Mobile
snippet.description: Mobile gamers can now battle it out League of Legends style with 'Heroes of Order & Chaos.' read »

snippet.title: 'Marvel Heroes' Beta Preview: All Click, No Reward
snippet.description: Marvel Heroes fails to live up to the hype---at least for its press beta preview. read »

snippet.title: ESports Director Sam "Milkfat" Braithwaite Reveals S2 Games Heroes Of Newerth Tour
snippet.description: VideoSam “Milkfat” Braithwaite, the pro gamer who set a Guinness World Record for playing S2 Games’ Heroes of Newerth (HoN) for 76 straight hours earlier this year, is now heading up the company’s eSports division. S2 Games is taking a page from Riot Games’ League of Legends (LoL) Championship Series [...] read »

snippet.title: S2 Games Talks 'Strife'
snippet.description: Video S2 Games (Savage, Heroes Of Newerth) has announced that it’s going to be revisiting the MOBA/ARTS market with a new title – Strife. With the deluge of options already on the market looking to take advantage of an increasing eSports presence and “MOBA fever” building on titles from Riot Games’ [...] read »
